name: Conqueror Of Planets
description:
Conqueror Of Planets is a 3D, third-person shooter, where the player controls an unknown being who, after having conquered his entire galaxy by his own hands, felt thirsty for more destruction. In this way, he aims to conquer all the planets in the universe while capturing the best marauders and forcing them to fight by his side, thus becoming the most powerful and fearsome being ever.

Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse (Left) - Shoot
  • Mouse (Right) - Sword
  • Space Bar - JetPack
  • E - Pick Items
  • 1, 2, 3 - Change Inventory Select
  • Escape - Pause
Developed by:
  • Pedro Passos - Programmer, Game Designer, Music
  • Pedro Ferreira - Programmer, Game Designer

[2021, Lusofona University, second-year Videogames Bachelor students]
